The proselyte sallet is a piece of Temple Knight Armour that requires 30 Defence, 20 Prayer, and completion of The Slug Menace quest to equip. It is only exceeded by the god mitres in Prayer bonus for the helmet slot.

It has the exact same bonuses as an Adamant full helm, except that it offers +4 Prayer bonus. Like other Proselyte equipment, it is white with a dark-gold trim.

This piece of armour cannot be made using the Smithing skill. Although this armour is trimmed, it cannot be obtained from any Treasure Trail.

The sallet can be stored in the armour case of a player-owned house. For Ultimate Ironmen, it can only be retrieved as part of a full set of the armour.

[[File:Proselyte sallet detail.png|left|120px]]
[[File:Proselyte sallet chathead.png|left]]
The '''proselyte sallet''' is a piece of [[Temple Knight Armour]] that requires 30 [[Defence]], 20 [[Prayer]], and completion of [[The Slug Menace]] quest to equip. It is only exceeded by the [[Mitre|god mitres]] in [[Prayer bonus]] for the helmet slot.

It has the exact same bonuses as an [[Adamant full helm]], except that it offers +4 Prayer bonus. Like other [[Proselyte]] equipment, it is white with a dark-gold trim.

This piece of [[armour]] cannot be made using the [[Smithing]] skill. Although this armour is trimmed, it cannot be obtained from any [[Treasure Trail]].

The sallet can be stored in the [[armour case]] of a [[player-owned house]]. For Ultimate Ironmen, it can only be retrieved as part of a full set of the armour.
